title: Stones River National Battlefield: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets          Pets are welcome at at Stones River National Battlefield as long as they are on a leash and under physical control. We also ask that pet owners clean up after their animals. Pet owners may not tie their animals to trees, monuments and other park structures. Pets are also not permitted in the visitor center unless they are providing assistance to a visitor with a disability.
